long: Meaning: the "hollow hand" or "palm" (so of the paw of an animal, of the sole, and even of the bowl of a dish or sling, the handle of a bolt, the leaves of a palm-tree); figuratively, "power".  Usage: branch,   foot, hand((-ful), -dle, (-led)), hollow, middle, palm, paw, power, sole, spoon.  Source: from "H3721";
